content: Do we know of any implementations of FHIR (as Facades?) for mainframe systems? @Paul Knapp mentioned some financial systems AFAIK. (I have some mainframe developers in my current FHIR Overview training course, which is my reason for asking)
@René Spronk I'm not aware of any specific mainframe implementations of FHIR.
I guess they'd mostly go for a facade of sorts..
You could run one in a linux (or other) VM but I'm not sure what the benefit of running it directly on the metal.
